arv9:9: Iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ sarvaśo rūpa-saṁjñānāṁ samatikramāt | praṭigha-saṁjñānām-astāṅgamān-nānātva-saṁjñānām-amanasikārād-anantam-ākāśam-ity-ākāśānantyāyatanam-upasaṁpadya viharati ||
arv9:10: Sarvaśo ākāśānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānam-iti vijñānānantyāyatanam-upasaṁpadya viharati ||
arv9:11: Sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramya nāsti kiñcid-iti | ākiñcanyāyatanam-upasaṁpadya viharati ||
